question: Who of the following won the IEBF Excellence Award 2017 recently?
explanation: Pawan Kalyan has received the prestigious Indo European Business Forum (IEBF) Excellence Award for his renowned work in the field of social and Community services. He is a Actor and also Leader of Jana Sena Party in Telangana and Andhra Pradesh.The award was presented in Global Business Meet-2017 at House of Lords, London.
